entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 20.
